Tool

NameChange a Grid's No-Data Value
ID36
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2016
Specificationgrid

Description

This tool allows changing a grid's no-data value or value range definition. It does not change the cell values of the grid. Its main purpose is to support this type of operation for tool chains and scripting environments.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid Grid (input)GRID
Options
TypeChoiceTYPEAvailable Choices: [0] single value [1] value range Default: 0
No-Data ValueFloating pointVALUEDefault: -99999.000000
No-Data Value RangeValue rangeRANGE
